SELECT DISTINCT list_name,dlv_status as 'list_delStatus',cal_price,list_amount, a.dlv_comp as 'list_company',a.dlv_num as 'list_delNum' ,a.dlv_code as 'list_code' FROM jachi.delivery a join (select b.pro_name as 'list_name',a.odr_count as 'list_amount',(a.odr_count*b.pro_price) as 'cal_price',a.odr_id FROM jachi.ordertable a join productinfo b on a.odr_procode = b.pro_code and a.odr_id=#{odr_id}) k where a.dlv_status=#{list_delStatus} group by a.dlv_code;
